title: (x) Pre Raphaelite Methods and Materials serif calligraphic face - Rialto {Mike Y}
content:
I need help with this one. I can find many similar, but nothing with this beautiful forward arching p.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tyope.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113044353/http:/typophile.com/files/tyope.jpg) | 43.57 KB |
author: gopated2inc@mac.com

comments.content:
I think that is "Rialto" from dftype in Austria.

- Mike Yanega

[Here is a showing](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113044353/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/SerifGuide/serifsamples/serif_qr/rialto_dft_full.gif) of the font from my Serif Font ID Guide. We have discussed this font before, and at that time there was only an e-mail to reach this foundry (no web site). The font family was quoted to be rather expensive ($560, if I recall). This sample was donated to me, and I do not have the font.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you thank you, and how disappointing. I came across Rialto before in Robert Bringhurst's beautiful book "The Tree of Meaning." One of these days I'll just hold my breath and take the plunge...
